description: The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission requires professional services for the development of a method for subsequent implementation as an Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) process.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
Comprehensive and Progressive Trand- Pacific Partnership Agreement
full_summary:
=====================================

**Methodology for Developing Risk Significance Insights**
--------------------------------------------------------

__Purpose:__ The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission invites proposals from qualified professionals to develop a methodology for subsequent implementation as an Artificial Intelligence (AI)/Machine Learning (ML) process.

**Reference Information**
-------------------------

*   PW-22-01012189
*   Amendment 2
*   Solicitation Number: 5000067070
*   Publication Date: 2022-11-02
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-03T11:00:00

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

*   The following trade agreements apply: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Contracting Entity: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, 280 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P5S9, Canada

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

*   Daniel Tilsley, Solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca

**Documents**
--------------

*   RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/7bac52b66408664200df2ed5da00d598/5000067070_-_rfp.pdf
*   Set 1- QA documents: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/1c8a4208ea7ef65db0e80044eaf0cfa4/5000067070_-_qa_set_1.pdf
*   Set 2 - QA documents: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/6dd17f52c1bb0d4a045244233b8f7736/5000067070_-_qa_set_2.pdf
*   (french version of documents only)

 *   french language version comes at the end.
